name: John Otterman
description:
John Otterman, a war hero of the Second Great Whale wars, is enjoying his life as a single father to his daughter on their homestead. An enemy from the war appears and takes his daughter away. As Otterman, you must jump through dimensions in order to find your enemy and retrieve your daughter.

Controls:
W/Up Arrow: Up 
A/Left Arrow: Left 
S/Down Arrow: Down 
D/Right Arrow: Right
R: Reload
Left Mouse Button: Shoot
Esc: Pause
